[[עַל]], for, in behalf of); in awe and reverence, at word of God, sq, [[בְּ]] Ezr 9:4, Is 66:2 (sq. [[עַל]]), v:Is 66:5 (sq. [[אֶל]]); cf. ´[[בְּמִחְוַת אל]] ´[[ח]] Ezr 10:3.
